getMessageFee(uint256,address,bytes).details: Telepathy does not have a fee and will subsidize the cost of execution for these messages.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateReceiverAdapter(uint256[],address[.details: Owner update receiver adapter address on dst chain.

dispatchMessage(uint256,address,bytes).notice: Send a message message to the Telepathy Router.

documentation.text: @dev Telepathy does not have a fee and will subsidize the cost of execution for these messages.
@notice Send a message message to the Telepathy Router.
